Comments_List: This class helps prepare you to be an officer in the US Air Force and the challenges that occupation entail.
Learned proper writing and briefing skills
Knowledge of the Air Force, particularly insights on how to deal with a variety of ethical situations and evaluations.
Continue to make the class closer to real world environment, will less readings and more hands on experience.

Strengths: variety of speakers, class discussions, the videos on sexual assault, impromtu in-class briefing assignments.
Weaknesses: variety of readings, amount of time spent on certain topics.
I would not recommend this class to Yale students unless they are already in AF ROTC.
